article: It's a fine Saturday morning. Kate  _  her father are in a big bus. There are  many  people in it. Some of them  _  from England, and some come from America and Canada. They look  _  . There is a young man. He is tall, heavy, and  _  long blonde hair. But the lady beside him is slender and has short curly hair. They seem  to be  outgoing, because they are  talking  all the time . They are going to the Imperial Palace. There are two  _  in the bus. One is  _  woman. She is  driving  the bus,  the other  is a young man. He  _  English very well. Now he is talking  _  the Imperial Palace.The other people are all  listening to  him . They like the Imperial Palace. They want to  see  it very much.
